term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - lapse rate in atmospheric chemistry
term.title: lapse rate

item.text: The variation of an atmospheric variable with height; unless otherwise stated the variable is temperature.

sources.item: PAC, 1990, 62, 2167. 'Glossary of atmospheric chemistry terms (Recommendations 1990)' on page 2199 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199062112167)
